li.defaultDesc: Cancel designated building, mining, hauling, harvesting, and all other designations.
Deconstruct this and reclaim part of its resources.
Paint buildings, apparel and terrain
Only deconstruct pipes part of the Turret ammunition network.
Cancel designated building, mining, hauling, harvesting, and all other designations.
Deconstruct this and reclaim part of its resources.
Designate rough stone walls to be smoothed.
Paint buildings, apparel and terrain
Remove bridges or gravship substructure to reveal the terrain underneath.
Cancel designated building, mining, hauling, harvesting, and all other designations.
Deconstruct this and reclaim part of its resources.
Open a menu to build props with a silver cost.
Paint buildings, apparel and terrain
Open a menu to build biome-specific buildings.
Cancel designated building, mining, hauling, harvesting, and all other designations.
Deconstruct this and reclaim part of its resources.
Paint buildings, apparel and terrain
Create a zone where your colonists will try to grow a certain kind of plant.
Create a zone where your colonists will try to grow mushrooms. Bear in mind that terrain will still need the fertility required by the mushroom to be sown.

Create a zone where your colonists will try to grow aquatic plants. Aquatic plants ignore terrain fertility but take a very long time to sow and harvest.
These zones can't be placed on oceanic (salty) water.
Create a zone where your colonists will try to grow sandy terrain plants. Sand plants ignore terrain fertility but take a very long time to sow and harvest.
Create a zone where your colonists will try to grow decorative flowers.
Cancel designated building, mining, hauling, harvesting, and all other designations.
Deconstruct this and reclaim part of its resources.
Paint buildings, apparel and terrain
Cancel designated building, mining, hauling, harvesting, and all other designations.
Deconstruct this and reclaim part of its resources.
Remove zones, like stockpile zones or growing zones.
Create a stockpile where your colonists will store resources. This tool can also expand any existing stockpile.
Create a stockpile where your colonists will store junk. This tool can also expand any existing stockpile.
Create a zone where your colonists will try to grow decorative flowers.
Create a zone where your colonists will try to grow sandy terrain plants. Sand plants ignore terrain fertility but take a very long time to sow and harvest.

Create a zone where your colonists will try to grow aquatic plants. Aquatic plants ignore terrain fertility but take a very long time to sow and harvest.
These zones can't be placed on oceanic (salty) water.
Create a zone where your colonists will try to fish
Create a zone where your colonists will try to grow mushrooms. Bear in mind that terrain will still need the fertility required by the mushroom to be sown.
Create a zone where your colonists will try to grow a certain kind of plant.
Create a zone where your colonists are allowed to bathe in water.
Colonists will repair buildings, clean floors, and extinguish fires only in the home area.
Removes a home area. Colonists will no longer clean, repair, or extinguish fires here.

Expand an allowed area.
Allowed areas are defined areas you can assign to colonists. Colonists will not accept work or fulfill their needs outside their allowed area.

Clear cells from an allowed area.
Allowed area are defined areas you can assign to colonists. Colonists will not accept work or fulfill their needs outside their allowed area.
Colonists will build roofs in this area.
Colonists will remove roofs in this area (except overhead mountain, which cannot be removed).
Colonists will ignore roofs in this area.
Designate an area where Runesmiths will automatically cast Greater Runecircle spots.
Removes Greater Runecircle spots. Runesmiths will no longer automatically cast Greater Runecircle spots in this area.
Designate an area where Runesmiths will automatically cast Runecircle.
Removes Runecircle spots. Runesmiths will no longer automatically cast Runecircle in this area.
Designate an area where Chronopaths will automatically cast Craft Timeskip.
Removes Craft Timeskip workshop. Chronopaths will no longer automatically cast Craft Timeskip in this area.

Create an area where vehicles will prioritize or avoid moving through.
'Prioritize' areas applied on the edge of the map will designate where vehicle caravans should enter from.
Removes road zone. Vehicles will no longer have modified movement over the area.
Terrain rendered in this area will have hard edges.
Clears out the hard edged area.
Paint buildings, apparel and terrain
Cancel designated building, mining, hauling, harvesting, and all other designations.
Deconstruct this and reclaim part of its resources.
Paint buildings, apparel and terrain
Cancel designated building, mining, hauling, harvesting, and all other designations.
Deconstruct this and reclaim part of its resources.
Create a hive area where your insectoid hives will work, look for prey and attack hostile targets. Your insectoids will not leave the hive area.
Removes a hive area. Your insectoids will no longer work, look for prey and attack hostile targets here.
Paint buildings, apparel and terrain
Cancel designated building, mining, hauling, harvesting, and all other designations.
Deconstruct this and reclaim part of its resources.

Place drop off spots for guest mounts. When traders or visitors arrive, they will temporarily leave their mounts at the mount spot closest to the place they gather. Mounts will stay near the drop off point until their rider returns.
Clear designated guest mount spots
Pawns will use mount spots when riding an animal that does not need to be penned. If it does, they will just go to a nearby pen instead.
Clears mount drop spots.

Pawns will avoid riding their mounts in a forbidden riding area. If their destination lies within one, they will use a nearby mount spot if the animal does not need to be penned. If it does, they will seek a pen instead.
Clears the forbid riding area.
Paint buildings, apparel and terrain
Cancel designated building, mining, hauling, harvesting, and all other designations.
Deconstruct this and reclaim part of its resources.
Deconstruct power conduits and reclaim part of their resources.
Paint buildings, apparel and terrain
Cancel designated building, mining, hauling, harvesting, and all other designations.
Deconstruct this and reclaim part of its resources.
Create a stockpile where your colonists will store resources. This tool can also expand any existing stockpile.
Create a stockpile where your colonists will store junk. This tool can also expand any existing stockpile.
Paint buildings, apparel and terrain
Cancel designated building, mining, hauling, harvesting, and all other designations.
Deconstruct this and reclaim part of its resources.

Cancel designated building, mining, hauling, harvesting, and all other designations.
Deconstruct this and reclaim part of its resources.

Cancel designated building, mining, hauling, harvesting, and all other designations.
Deconstruct this and reclaim part of its resources.
Paint buildings, apparel and terrain
Cancel designated building, mining, hauling, harvesting, and all other designations.
Deconstruct this and reclaim part of its resources.
Paint buildings, apparel and terrain
Removes Solar Pinhole spots. Skipmasters will no longer automatically cast Solar Pinhole in this area.
Designate an area where Skipmasters will automatically cast Solar Pinhole.
Cancel designated building, mining, hauling, harvesting, and all other designations.
Deconstruct this and reclaim part of its resources.
Designate areas of rock to be mined out.
Marks trees to be chopped down for wood.
Marks plants to be cut and destroyed. The plant will be completely removed, and any food or resource yield will be harvested.
Marks plants to be harvested for their food or other products.
Mark animals to be hunted by your hunters.
Slaughter a tame animal.
Tame a wild animal.
Your colonists will freely haul this item to any suitable stockpile
Mark items to be hauled to a specific level.
Mark items as not forbidden. Colonists will be able to interact with the designated items.
Mark items as forbidden. Colonists will not be able to interact with the designated items.
Claim neutral structures for the colony, including ancient ruins and abandoned siege bases. Claimed structures can be repaired and maintained by your colonists.
Giving up ownership of buildings will prevent you from using most of their features, but the enemy will not attack them.
Designate rough stone terrain and walls to be smoothed.
Designate walls and buildings to be painted using dye from tinctoria plants, which you can grow. Only certain buildings can be painted.
Designate floors to be painted using dye from tinctoria plants, which you can grow. Only certain floors can be painted.
Remove paint from walls, buildings, and floors.
Construct new hull in place of wreckage
Extract stacks from corpses.
Mark unarmed rearmable traps to be rearmed by your colonists.
Your colonists will leave this item where it is-- unless it is needed imminently, or you explicitly create a job to haul it somewhere.
Execute a downed enemy.
Open containers.
Open containers.
Marks animals to be nonviolently shooed away from the colony. Animals will pass through doors while fleeing.
Paint buildings, apparel and terrain
Designate this item to be uninstalled and reinstalled somewhere else.
Cancel designated building, mining, hauling, harvesting, and all other designations.
Deconstruct this and reclaim part of its resources.
Remove sewage from the ground and place it into barrels.
Designate areas to fertilize with biosolids.
Designate sections of a pipe type for deconstruction.

Designate an area where Frostshapers will automatically cast Ice Crystal.
Removes Ice Crystal spots. Frostshapers will no longer automatically cast Ice Crystal in this area.

Create a zone where your colonists are allowed to bathe in water.

Remove floors to reveal the terrain underneath.

Designate floors to be painted using dye from tinctoria plants, which you can grow. Only certain floors can be painted.
Remove paint from floors.

Cancel designated building, mining, hauling, harvesting, and all other designations.
Deconstruct this and reclaim part of its resources.
Designate an area where colonists will manually clean polluted terrain. Cleaning the terrain removes pollution from the ground and packages it into toxic wastepacks which can be carried away.
Removes the pollution removal area. Colonists will no longer manually extract pollution from the terrain in this area.
Create an area which colonists will try to keep clear of snow.
Removes a snow removal area. Colonists will no longer try to keep this area clear of snow.

Only deconstruct pipes part of the Chemfuel network.
Only deconstruct pipes part of the Deepchem network.
Only deconstruct pipes part of the Helixien gas network.
Only deconstruct pipes part of the Milk network.
Only deconstruct pipes part of the Nutrient paste network.
Only deconstruct pipes part of the Neutroamine network.
